title: Void Crack (Part 1)
body:
Void Crack (Part 1)

"Flicker Step," Evan used his flicker step skill and took a step forward. As he took a step forward, his appearance started to change. Deep orange flames appeared around him, his height increased to 210 CM and his body turned completely black. His eyes turned deep red and a powerful aura burst forth from his body.

"Shadow Possession," Evan muttered and along with Flicker Step, used the shadow possession skill to merge himself with Asher.

It was the first time Evan had merged himself with Asher using the shadow possession skill and he was shocked because of the power that was surging within his body after merging with Asher.

Because of the flicker step and the boost provided by the shadow possession skill, Evan appeared in front of the void crack in an instant.

The Eldritch Creature who was sleeping within the void crack obviously noticed the energy fluctuations the moment Evan used his shadow possession and flicker step skill and was jolted awake.
